mapper.select: SELECT EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD AS spotCd /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL /* 스팟 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ ,EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_SPOT_EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_F(R),SYS_C0011679(C) */ AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL_EZC_SP(R),SYS_C0011680(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL /* 스팟 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ ,EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD AS spotCd /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL /* 스팟 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ ,EZC_SPOT /* 스팟 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = EZC_SPOT.SPOT_CD
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL.SPOT_CD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL SET /* 스팟 맵핑 시설 */ DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬 순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ WHERE 1=1 AND SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_SPOT_MAPPING_FACL /* 스팟 맵핑 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND SPOT_CD = #{spotCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 스팟 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
